cmput301f13t10.view

Class SectionEditView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • cmput301f13t10.view.SectionEditView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionView

    public class SectionEditView
extends Activity
implements SectionView
    This is the view of a section it can have images or text added to it it can also navigate to the modify choices menu and back to the adventure edit view
    Author:
    Braeden Soetaert, Tyler Meen, Steven Gerdes, Aly-khan Jamal
